response.original_title: Богатая жизнь в Северной Корее изнутри
response.overview: We travelled to North Korea to discover what locals consider the best their country has to offer and how they seek to impress visiting tourists. Surprisingly, tours in the DPRK can be described as truly luxurious. What does North Korean luxury look like? What is considered “the best” in the country? How do people entertain themselves and what do they drink in one of the most secretive nations on Earth? All the answers can be found in this new film by Kollektiv.
response.tagline: What if North Korea’s perfection isn’t the full picture?
response.title: Богатая жизнь в Северной Корее изнутри
